text:
a list to share 2) you would reach out to Anna Lisa to see if the RO applied to you.
I hope this shows I want to work with you constructively. I'm still your husband. And while we fight, until that ink dries, I owe you the respect and
dignity to listen to my wife's feedback and be a better husband. And no matter what "progressive" therapists may say, I'm not dating and won't
commit adultery. I owe you out of respect for our 29 years. Let's do this.. till we aren't married.
Have a great night, Christine. And sweet dreams.
Your STILL husband for a few more months, who still wants to be better for you ..,
- robert
Message 1345 of 4024
I’ll call Xfinity this weekend to see if I can resolve. Alternatively you could call and see what they suggest.
Thank you fir letting me know

Subject:Re: Still getting alerts

Hi There!
I will move on this today
Please also share the list.
Admittedly I am realizing how much my nervous system is appreciating the calm and removal of chaos in my life. It was stressful, unhelpful and
incredibly traumatizing. That is certainly not what I want to return to.
Christine
Sent:02/13/2024 at 09:20 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 09:23 AM)
Subject:Re: Touch Base
Message 1347 of 4024
No worries. If you’re not down trying to reverse course, that’s your prerogative. But, the chaos is due to not being able to communicate and solve
issues.
I appreciate the quiet too. But if you feel like trying for a more peaceful and constructive conversation is going to make things worse. It will. It’s self-
fulfilling.
I’ll stop this track and begin working through Lisa. Lots is housecleaning, but I reached out because I feel like we also have consequential legal issues
